item.title: Ben Affleck Tells Michael B. Jordan Their Friendship Means 'More Than You Know'

item.title: Jonathan Bailey Supports Childhood Friend at Broadway Opening — and Reunites with “Fellow Travelers” Costar Jelani Alladin
item.description: The reigning Sexiest Man Alive was a Broadway baby at the opening of Kit Buchan's 'Two Strangers (Carry a Cake Across New York)'

item.title: Steven Soderbergh Was 'Surprised' How 'Open and Excited' John Lennon Was in Final Interview on the Day He Died
item.description: Soderbergh is working on a new documentary that focuses on Lennon and wife Yoko Ono's interview with RKO Radio on the day the ex-Beatle died

item.title: Dolly Parton Is Breaking into the Truck Stop Business to ‘Fill a Void’ on Highways: ‘A Place That Feels Like Home’
item.description: The award-winning country superstar is bringing her signature style to Dolly’s Tennessean Travel Stop, set to open in the early summer of 2026
